title: Trojans in Profiles
content: Windows Defender is finding trojans in \AppData\Local\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\tzdqa74q.default\cache2\entries\ every day now. Why and how do I correct this?

title: Restoring my bookmarks and settings from my old browser
content:
Hello,

My old computer which I had all my bookmarks and passwords stored on it has died. I got a new one and installed Firefox, but can't seem to see any of my old settings. I did not back them up as I assumed they were all stored on the cloud. Is there a way for me to get them back? (including all the websites I stored).

I don't have anywehre else to import the data from.

Thank you and Happy New Year, Ori

creator: valerie.graff

title: Profile settings and Add-ons disappeared
content:
My add-on and default profile have disappeared after I entered safe mode. The browser window restarted with a new interface with different settings and all my add-ons were gone. There reason why I tried out safe-mode was to restore my open tabs which were lost after firefox updates but still showing in history without the possibility to restore them. Currently, I have three profiles in about:profiles but non of them contains my add-ons data. They all appeared as if I am opening the browser for the first time. Inside the profiles file explore, there are 5 newly created profiles see attached screenshots.

Things I did, Cleared cache, refreshed the profiles and restart the browser nothing works.

What is going on. :(. This sucks. I had special add-ons which contained my valuable settings and now they are all gone.
creator: kgerson

title: Webpage does not use all available space
content:
Hello !

I am trying out a Linux (Fedora 39) with enhanced privacy (hardened firefox with the user.js from Arkenfox). My problem is the following : When I quit a video that was in full screen with Esc. the inner window dedicated to the webpage resizes to a smaller one such as the one seen in the screenshot.

I fixed that by going into troubleshoot mode and the window went back to its original size and then reactivated my extensions but the same problem appeared when following the process aforementioned.

Any idea what could be causing this ?

Best regards,
creator: Fowlerz

title: i have tested to see if the loginsbackupjson will have my saved login i removed by accident
content:
I made a fack saved login called ilove123.com

and i had the password be 123

i then clicked the three bars selected help selected more troubleshooting information and selected open folder of my profile

i selected loginsjson searched for ilove123 and it was found

i then removed the saved login ilove123.com

and i repeated the process of reopening profile folder

i selected loginsjson lookked for the login it was not there

but when i selected loginsbackupjson

it was there!

which can only mean my login that i accidently deleted is also in the loginsbackjsonfile of my current profile

but how do i decrypt it?
creator: thespiankyle550086

title: locked out of Gmail accounts
content:
G'day, Had a bit of bad luck. My computer died of natural causes. I am clumsy as they come, and split a jug of water on it...by mistake. This occurred as I was changing phone providers, because privatization gives you so many options to choose from, the useless to the inept......the tyranny of choice

Anyhow when I got my new computer I could not log on to either of my two gmail accounts (yabbieroad@gmail.com/ mydarlinggirlrachael@gmail.com) and I am not that senile just yet, that I can't remember the two or three passwords that I alternate for gmail. Easy fixed, change the password, get a verification number sent to the phone number you had just before you changed providers. Now you have a new number that you can't change because you cannot log in to your account.

I just had another go at getting in via logging on and of on youtube, and don't ask me how this transpired, but for some reason I got a message to verify my current email, and was informed it will take 5 days to verify that mydarlinggirlrachael@gmail.com is my account. I will believe that when I can long in.

I did the same again for yabbieroad, and was just denied access with no option offered

I have had a 20 email exchange with Nord, who acknowledge I have purchased Nord Locker, but unfortunately they cannot move it across to my new email, because they are @#$^%&. I have had to go through the same process for 20 virtual music plug ins. suppliers, many have been great, others should be put up against a wall and have some stern words fired at them.

I would appreciate any assistance, as I have chronic fatigue, and reading and writing are particularly draining, so is thinking, for that matter. So I try not to think about it, which is still thinking, when you think about it. If i can get into my gmail, that's one less thing I have to think about

Over and out DD
creator: daviddieni1313

title: Video not displayed
content: I found Firefox slow down a lot when I browse web sites with lots of videos on the pages. Presently, it's 121.0 64-bit Firefox. Recently, I assume it happens after update, some of videos do not appear at all in Firefox. I killed all the add-ons, and re-installed Firefox, but still cannot see a video. For instance, in the following page, https://www.etoland.co.kr/bbs/board.php?bo_table=star01&wr_id=1003205 I can see a video from Chrome but noting with Firefox. There is no blank space as there were nothing on that page in Firefox. Please, fix my favorite web browser. Dec 20, 2023

title: How to turn off my location data in Firefox
content:
I have tried to look this up online but nothing I have found has worked even when I put today's date in the query. I have a VPN that alters my "location" which has given me all sorts of search and other issues. I just want to turn off all location data so I can search without being put in "Dallas" or "Houston". Help please.


[IMHO one of the worst things about the Web is when some lazy egomaniacs decided to eliminate all article posting dates. That has led to horrible, but unmarked, out-of-date "help" files of every kind.
creator: cre8onlyluv

title: Skewed printing with Firefox
content: For the last few months whenever I try to print any Google Docs text file using the Firefox Print command, all text is skewed to the right of the page. That causes the farthest right text to be lost. I can use the Print command of the Google browser and have no such issue. I really don't want to have to go back to Google. Is this a system bug or is there something I can do to fix this?
creator: cre8onlyluv

title: Which about:config custom settings are still valid
content:
Lately, I'm experiencing less that optimal behavior and performance, so I'm building a fresh profile hoping to clean things up.

Like many of us, over the years I've collected and documented a number of tweaks. Before I re-implement them, I was hoping to publish them here to get opinions about their current validity/necessity, effectiveness, safety, detrimental affects, etc.

Would it be for me to post these about:config tweaks?
creator: noel_envoide
